title: Child and adult shot in Dekalb County
content:
A 12-year-old child and an adult were hospitalized following a shooting in Dekalb County on Friday night, Al.com's news partner WHNT News 19 reported.
The two were shot on County Road 9055, Sheriff Jimmy Harris said. He said the victims drove themselves to the hospital, where they are being treated.
Authorities don't know what caused the shooting, but a person of interest has been detained.
